current_task.title: User Testing: Verify Room Joining Works After Preset Fix
current_task.description:
BUG-002-fix2 has been implemented. The Matrix room creation now uses:
- preset: 'public_chat' (was 'private_chat')
- visibility: 'public' (was 'private')

This should allow any user to join a room without invitation.

TEST STEPS:
1. Browser A: Create a room (e.g., 'testroom')
2. Browser B (incognito): Join the same room by name
3. Verify both users can see each other and communicate

If working: Update FEEDBACK.md to mark BUG-002 as resolved
If still failing: Add error details to FEEDBACK.md
acceptance_criteria: User can create a room in one browser
Another user can join the room by name from a different browser/incognito
Both users can see each other in the room
